#summary How to install NCTUns in Fedora 9.
#labels Featured

= Introduction =

[http://nsl10.cs.nctu.edu.tw/ NCTUns] is a high-fidelity and extensible network simulator. 

This document describes how to install NCTUns (which runs only in Fedora Linux 9) in a Debian/Ubuntu system, using the x86 virtualualization machine [http://www.virtualbox.org/ VirtualBox]. 

= Install a virtualized Fedora 9 system =

Install the VirtualBox Open Edition, the kernel modules and run it:

{{{
$ sudo apt-get install virtualbox-ose virtualbox-ose-modules-2.6-686
$ VirtualBox
}}}

Create a _Fedora 9_ profile and create a virtual hard disk (use dynamic allocation) 

Download the [http://ftp.udl.es/pub/fedora/linux/releases/9/Fedora/i386/iso/Fedora-9-i386-DVD.iso Fedora 9 DVD image] and configure VirtualBox to use as CD/DVD image. 

Run the profile. The DVD should boot. The first step in the installation is testing the CD/DVD, skip it (otherwise the installation program will hang). Install a Fedora 9 system (you can disable _office and productivity_ and enable _software development_ in packages selection).

= Install NCTUns =

Download the last version [http://nsl10.csie.nctu.edu.tw/products/nctuns/download/download.php here] and uncompress and enter into the NCTUns directory:

{{{
wget http://nsl10.csie.nctu.edu.tw/download/NCTUns-allinone-linux-2.6.25.9-f9.20080919-3.tar.gz
tar xzf NCTUns-allinone-linux-2.6.25.9-f9.20080919-3.tar.gz
cd NCTUns-5.0
}}}

You must create a _install.conf_ configuration file. Copy the existing _install.conf-example_ and edit it to instruct the install script to build everything (including the kernel, which is disabled by default: _install_kernel=yes). Then run the _install_ script as root:

{{{
sudo ./install.sh -c install.conf
}}}

You must now configure you shell preferences to include the NCTUns environment variables. Add these lines to the the file _/home/user/.bashrc:

{{{ 
export NCTUNSHOME=/usr/local/nctuns
export NCTUNS_TOOLS=$NCTUNSHOME/tools
export NCTUNS_BIN=$NCTUNSHOME/bin
export PATH=${NCTUNS_BIN}:${PATH}
}}}

Finally, reboot the virtual matchine to use the NCTUns modified kernel.

= Running NCTNs ==

Login the system and run the client GUI:

{{{
$ nctunsclient
}}}
